Adjany da Silva Freitas Costa (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Angola na-ahụ maka ihe ndị dị ndụ na onye na-echekwa ihe ndị dị na Huambo onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Ọdịbendị, Njem na Gburugburu Ebe Obibi site n'April ruo Ọktoba 2020.
Costa nwere nzere masta na Biology na PhD na International Wildlife Conservation Practices site na Mahadum Oxford.

Na 2015, Costa bụ akụkụ nke njem si Angola gaa n'obodo Maun, Botswana site na mokoro iji gosipụta njikọ nke Osimiri Okavango na mmetụta nke Agha Obodo Angolan na gburugburu obodo nke mba ahụ. Nke a bụ ihe ndabere nke ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke afọ 2018 Into the Okavango, nke ọ pụtara na ya.

Costa bụ onye Afrịka meriri na United Nations Environment Programme Young Champions of the Earth award n'afọ 2019 maka nkwado ya iji chebe Okavango Delta. E nyekwara ya ihe nrite Angolan First Order of Civil Merit n'afọ 2019. Ọ natara nke a n'ihi ọrụ nchekwa obodo ya na ndị Luchaze nke ugwu ugwu ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Angola na Okavango Delta. Ọ bụ onye National Geographic Explorer.

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista omenala, njem nlegharị anya na gburugburu ebe obibi na Eprel 2020 mgbe ọ dị afọ 30, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi ọdụdụ na akụkọ ntolite Angola. Onye isi ala João Lourenço mechara wepụ ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020 ma debe ya dị ka onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala.
